thread.title: Robert
thread.title_full: Traffic School 4 Busy People reviewed by Robert

author: Robert
title: Robert
text:
This was an easy course to get through. I had to log off and on a few times with my busy schedule. It was easy to pick up where I left off. I enjoyed learning and understanding the reasons for some of the new laws. Thank you for the background.
I did see a few typos through the course. If those were not there this would be a solid five stars.
